Deemos, in reaction, let Psuedo take the blast. Deemos fires a missile at
Desmonus.

"I'm not that stupid." Deemos said. He had a hostage and wasn't about to not
let the hostage take whatever damage, he was going to kill him anyway...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, September 08, 2000 9:27 AM
Subject: Watch Out, Deemos!


>
>
> * Desmonus spots the battle from below, coming to a stop in mid-air and
> simply huvering there, her wings beating steadily at her sides.
> So, those were the fool Maximals that they were attacking?
> Hmm...then it was vital for her to chose her target from above, and more
> wise as well.
> She looked over the Maximals from whom she had to chose from, finally
seeing
> the perfect target...but not one she would chose to feed on. No...she
needed
> better mech-fluid then that, and she was fairly picky when it came to her
> meals as well.
> However...on her way to this area she had smelled a rather deliciouse
scent,
> one of mech-fluid but with a strong flow. ( Dinobot's) That meant that
it's
> owner was healthy and strong, the perfect one in which she could feed.
> However, the scent had been stronger then it normaly was, then when she
> simply smelling it INSIDE the body. No...the scent was stronger because
the
> fluid had to be outside the body...wounded.
> She would make it a chore to find this bot whom owned such deliciouse
> mech-fluid and feed upon him, quenching her hunger with only the best.
> But she turned her amber eyes back to the battle and saw Zardus land,
firing
> off at some Maximals.
> Well, she guessed that it was about time that she got down and dirty, she
> folded her wings in and dove towards her target.(Deemos.)
> In mid-dive she transformed into robot mode and removed a boomerang like
> object from her back, poison dripping blades along it's edge.
> She threw her arm back and then snapped it forward, sending the poison
> boomerang towards Deemos from above.
> Battle not, feed later.*
>
>
